      Initializes new WikiPage element each time a page starts in the XML-File, also resets the boolean variables for the escaping of a page and if it is a category page.

    • Method Detail

      • startElement

        public void startElement(java.lang.String uri,
                         java.lang.String localName,
                         java.lang.String qName,
                         org.xml.sax.Attributes attributes)
                  throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Initializes new WikiPage element each time a page starts in the XML-File, also resets the boolean variables for the escaping of a page and if it is a category page.
        Specified by:
        startElement in interface org.xml.sax.ContentHandler
        Overrides:
        startElement in class org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
        Parameters:
        uri - the namespace uri String for the element
        localName - the localname of an element without the prefix
        qName - the name of an element with the prefix
        attributes - the attributes of an element
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - SAXException throws an exception if XML-File is inconsistent

      • endElement

        public void endElement(java.lang.String uri,
                       java.lang.String localName,
                       java.lang.String qName)
                throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        When the tag is closed all information have been extracted for the tag. Here the necessary information from a page in the XML get saved in the wikipage element. Also the boolean variables are set for escaping a page and for extracting the categories. Here also the processing for the parent categories and inlinks take place.
        Specified by:
        endElement in interface org.xml.sax.ContentHandler
        Overrides:
        endElement in class org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
        Parameters:
        uri - the namespace uri String for a element
        localName - the localname of an element without the prefix
        qName - the name of an element with the prefix
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - throws an exception if XML-File is inconsistent

      • characters

        public void characters(char[] chars,
                       int start,
                       int len)
                throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Extends the String which holds the content of an element with the characters read.
        Specified by:
        characters in interface org.xml.sax.ContentHandler
        Overrides:
        characters in class org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
        Parameters:
        chars - the characters which have been read while running through an elements content
        start - the offset from the beginning of the String
        len - the length of the character array
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - throws an exception if XML-File is inconsistent

      • extractLinks

        public void extractLinks(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> parent_categories,
                         java.lang.String categorie)
        Extracts the links and the categories from the String which contains all links or categories.
        Parameters:
        parent_categories - The ArrayList containing the links or categories after processing
        categorie - The String which determines the beginning of a link or category in the content
